title: Data Engineer: Data Modeling
tagsAndSkills: azure data factory,data engineering,sql server,data modeling,postgresql,hive,python,oracle
jobDescription:
Your Role and Responsibilities
  • Translates business needs into a data model, providing expertise on data modeling tools and techniques for designing data models for applications and related systems.
  • Utilize tools like Azure Data Factory for orchestrating and automating data workflows.
  • Identifying the data migration impact of all proposed changes. Reviewing gaps and proposing a solution for data availability during the solution design phase.
  • Plan, implement and manage the movement of data between existing and new deployments from functional stand point.
  • Own data migration requirements and functional needs
  • Design Database schema considering existing database schema.
  • Own Data pipeline for existing and new application along with reporting/Analysis.
  • Strategize and plan data movement with impact identification.


Required Technical and Professional Expertise
  • BE B Tech in any stream, M.Sc. (Computer Science/IT) M.C.A, with Minimum 5 plus years of experience
  • Experience in Translates business needs into a data model, providing expertise on data modeling tools and techniques for designing data models for applications and related systems.
  • Experience in Utilize tools like Azure Data Factory for orchestrating and automating data workflows.
  • Experience in Develop and propose data migration best practices for Big Bang or Incremental migration.


Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
  • Experience in techniques of designing data models for applications and related systems.
  • Design, develop and implement data migration solutions from MS SQL to POstgresQL using CDC and solace capabilities.
  • Experience in designing, developing, and deploying large-scale distributed database systems..

title: HR Service Delivery Associate
tagsAndSkills: talent acquisition,hr generalist activities,employee engagement,payroll,hr operations,joining formalities,hr administration,performance management
jobDescription:
Skill required: Employee Services - Employee and Labor Relations

Designation: HR Service Delivery Associate

Qualifications:Any Graduation

Years of Experience:1 to 3 years

What would you do?
Improve workforce performance and productivity, boosts business agility, increases revenue and reduces costsEmployee Services - More into query/case managementEmployment and Labor Law encompasses the relationships among unions, employers, and employees. Labor laws grant employees in certain sectors the right to unionize and allow employers and employees to engage in certain workplace-related activities in order to further their demands for changes in the employer-employee relationship. Employment law, on the other hand, is defined more broadly as the negotiated relationships between employers and employees.

What are we looking for?
  • In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines
  • Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor
  • You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments
  • The decisions that you make would impact your own work
  • You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work
